summary: Social Media Coordinator with experience in developing creative strategies, growing follower bases, and analyzing trends; proficient with Microsoft Office, Photoshop, WordPress, Google Analytics, and multiple social media platforms. Background includes social media, content creation, e-commerce tools, and basic bookkeeping.

experience.title: Social Media Coordinator
experience.description: Proposing creative strategy in collaboration with marketing director. Adding 45 quality boards on Pinterest and resulting in 47% follower growth. Posting on Twitter and Instagram at least once a day. Keeping track of social media trends and competition via Alexa Rank and Google Analytics. Creating relevant contests to grow brand recognition and excitement.

experience.title: Social Media Intern
experience.description: Website and social media optimization. Monitoring and posting on blogs, forums, and social networks. Online outreach and promotion using Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and email marketing.

experience.title: Bookkeeper
experience.description: Inputting vouchers, invoices, checks, account statements, reports, and other records. Managing charges and refunds. Recording business transactions and key daily worksheets to the general ledger system.

experience.title: Medical Record Clerk
experience.description: Transferring patients' data into DOH website. Reviewing 500+ records for completeness, accuracy, and compliance with regulations on a monthly basis; preparing quarterly reports.
